mapper.select: SELECT /*+ index_desc(q)*/ qb_number, tp_number, q.user_email, u.user_name, qb_title, qb_content, qb_answer, regdate, updatedate FROM tbl_question_board q, tbl_user u WHERE q.user_email = u.user_email AND q.user_email = #{user_email} OFFSET (#{currPage} - 1) * #{amount} rows FETCH NEXT #{amount} ROWS ONLY
SELECT * FROM (SELECT /*+ index_desc(tbl_community)*/ * FROM tbl_community WHERE user_email = #{user_email}) OFFSET (#{currPage} - 1) * #{amount} rows FETCH NEXT #{amount} ROWS ONLY

SELECT * FROM (SELECT /*+ index_desc(tbl_comment)*/ * FROM tbl_comment WHERE user_email = #{user_email} AND fb_number IS NOT NULL) OFFSET (#{currPage} - 1) * #{amount} rows FETCH NEXT #{amount} ROWS ONLY

SELECT * FROM (SELECT /*+ index_desc(tbl_individual_question)*/ * FROM tbl_individual_question WHERE user_email = #{user_email}) OFFSET (#{currPage} - 1) * #{amount} rows FETCH NEXT #{amount} ROWS ONLY

SELECT q.iq_number, q.user_email, q.iq_title, q.iq_content, q.iq_date, a.ia_title, a.ia_content, a.ia_date FROM tbl_individual_question q LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_individual_answer a ON q.iq_number = a.iq_number WHERE q.iq_number = #{iq_number}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT /*+ index_desc(tbl_withdrawal)*/ * FROM tbl_withdrawal WHERE user_email = #{user_email}) OFFSET (#{currPage} - 1) * #{amount} rows FETCH NEXT #{amount} ROWS ONLY

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_withdrawal VALUES (w_num.NEXTVAL, #{user_email}, #{bank_account}, #{w_quantity}, #{w_quantity}*180-2000, '승인 대기', CURRENT_DATE, null)
